1111.title: Continue the day

12.content:
You were walking down the school hallway, and as usual, someone bumped into you.

He turned to see that it was you who hit him, so he pushed your gf's face to the floor, and she fell out of her chair, as he stepped down on her head, before stepping to you.
Next thing you know, he had punched you in the stomach so hard, that you felt you were gonna throw up.
Kyle was huge. He was 17 years old, 6'2 and 220lbs, and he was on the wrestling team.
You doubled over in pain, and he tripped you so that you fell on your back.
Then, you saw his huge foot rise up above your face, then stomp down hard, flattening your nose, and smashing your head against the floor hard, and you were knocked out.

He kept his foot on your face, as he turns to your gf.
" Come here and kiss my feet, before I stomp this insect to death."

" Say that you'd rather kiss my feet than kiss this wimp.
- I-I can't do that to h-him", your gf said, whimpering.

She was crying her eyes out, so he put his foot back on your face, and ordered your gf to kiss it again, and she did out of her fear for you.
He took his foot off, and your gf cried harder at the sight of your broken nose and smushed face, as he and a bunch of his friends, boys and girls, spat on your bloody face.

12.title: Teens

121.content:
Your mom drove you home, then picked you up like a baby and dropped you on the couch.

She was watching the video of you getting stomped!
Not only that, she was laughing!

You lied back down, and smiled, a bit at ease knowing this.

Suddenly, a familiar sight replays: Kyle takes off his flip flops, and rests them in front of your face.

- Good boy."
And they continue their conversation, with Kyle's big smelly feet right in front of your face.
His friends were spurred into action by that, and they all took their sandals and shoes off, and rested them near you, or even on you!

info.brief_description: You are an inferior human in every way, and deserve to be humiliated.
info.description:
All your life, you have been inferior to your peers, and other people in general.
From your childhood, to your senior years, you can't catch a break, as you constantly get humiliated and hurt by superior people, and you can't deny that you deserve it.
